Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

question.title: What is the primary cause of photophobia in post-paralytic facial hemispasm?

option_a.title: Avascular necrosis of the facial nerve

option_b.title: Avascular necrosis of the trigeminal nerve

option_c.title: Avascular necrosis of the facial nerve

option_d.title: Avascular necrosis of the trigeminal nerve

correct_option.title: Avascular necrosis of the facial nerve
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
